title: Macau SAR
summary: Citigroup has had a presence in Hong Kong and Macau since 1902, proudly serving governmental institutions, financial institutions, multinational corporations and institutional investors across a range of corporate banking, lending, transaction services, and markets businesses. Citigroup continues to be focused and committed to servicing Macau's strong network of local & multinational corporations, supporting the accelerating growth of Macau in the region.
